wiki.summary: “Indigo” is the title track from Chris' ninth studio album and also serves as the opener. In the track, Chris sings about bright colors, including indigo/purple, green and yellow. “Indigo” is also the first of four color-themed songs on the album. The title “Indigo” could be stemmed from the spiritual connotations in the song. The color indigo is associated with the third eye chakra, which Chris mentions, “open my third eye.” It has to do with your intuition Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Indigo” is the title track from Chris' ninth studio album and also serves as the opener. In the track, Chris sings about bright colors, including indigo/purple, green and yellow. “Indigo” is also the first of four color-themed songs on the album. The title “Indigo” could be stemmed from the spiritual connotations in the song. The color indigo is associated with the third eye chakra, which Chris mentions, “open my third eye.” It has to do with your intuition, and being in touch with both the physical and spiritual realm, hence “woke.” Chris sees his girl in this sense and wants to learn from her. Chris is also able to visualize heightened sense of colors. Green representing renewal, energy and growth; a yellow mood connecting with creativity and purple light beams believed to be associated with mercy and transformation. Read more on Last.fm.
